name: Ensorcelled (Revolution Game)
description:
Ensorcelled is a turn-based 2D combat game. Trapped in a dungeon, you must survive as long as possible for the rescue to arrive.. or they won't. How to Play?
  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click - Attack
  • E - Skip your round
Your goal is to survive as long as possible.
You will be healed every wave.
There will have monsters every wave, and every three waves there will have a boss wave.

Check this maybe
